duties_responsibilities.duty:
Project Lead 
Participating in scheduling and resource planning, developing item-specific training, coordinating with program and project managers, managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and performing post-project work and data analysis.

Content Expertise 
Thorough knowledge of science topics used for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science, understanding and application of state and national science standards. Apply science expertise in item development and scoring process.

Logistics and Communication 
Clear communication via chat, email, phone, reports, and videoconference meetings. In-person and virtual interactions with the customer and other educators. Strong ability to work in a team environment.

Training and Coaching 
Mentoring and training Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers. Live or pre-recorded module training for Science and potentially Math items.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
